attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am a 13 year old boy at a school called swcc upper school and i am just sick of homework as we spend roughly 2/3 of our childhood in school, 1/4 of that doing homework. it would make it a whole lot easier if we only had work in school or little revise work out side but i am making this petition on the bases of a news report i seen, saying that a 13-14 year old pupil spend roughly 2-3 hours a day doing homework.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
